duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee and perform maintenance repairs throughout the property, including electrical, plumbing, HVAC, carpentry, dry wall, and appliance repair.
Manage preventative maintenance and respond to after-hours and weekend emergency maintenance and custodial requirements.
Utilize property management software to manage service repair requests and maintain an accurate inventory of maintenance items.
Create and manage a budget for maintenance operations and ensure compliance with policies and safety regulations.
Lead, motivate, and develop a successful, inclusive, and diverse property maintenance team, providing timely performance feedback and mediation as needed.
Deliver outstanding customer service to all residents, managing difficult situations with professionalism and care.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent required, additional certifications in HVAC-EPA, Certified Pool Operator (CPO), and property management software preferred.
